front.title: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol

abstract.t: This document supplies the protocol definition for a revised andupdated specification for internationalized domain names (IDNs). Therationale for these changes, the relationship to the olderspecification, and important terminology are provided in otherdocuments. This document specifies the protocol mechanism, calledInternationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA), forregistering and looking up IDNs in a way that does not requirechanges to the DNS itself. IDNA is only meant for processing domainnames, not free text.
